meanings.definition: Detinues: goods wrongfully detained by someone
meanings.sent1: The detinues were finally returned to their rightful owner.
meanings.sent2: The detinues were found hidden in the back of the warehouse.
meanings.sent3: The detinues played hide and seek with the owner, but they were discovered!
meanings.sent4: The detinues were like precious gems, held tightly by the wrong hands.
meanings.sent5: The detinues whispered stories of their adventures while in captivity.

meanings.definition: Detinues: the act of detaining goods wrongfully
meanings.sent1: The detinues caused a lot of trouble for the shopkeeper.
meanings.sent2: The detinues led to a legal dispute between the two parties.
meanings.sent3: The detinues decided to go on strike and refused to be released!
meanings.sent4: The detinues were like stubborn children, refusing to leave their spot.
meanings.sent5: The detinues danced around the room, teasing their captor.
